title: PHOTOS: Fayetteville area shelter dogs for adoption
summary: These dogs and puppies at the Cumberland and Harnett County animal shelters are looking for a home. See cats available for adoption in a separate slideshow. Adoption information is provided with every photo. For updated information, or to post animals available for adoption and inform people about fundraisers, fostering opportunities and supply and volunteer needs, join the Observer's Pet Welfare & Rescue group here: bit.ly/fo_petwelfare. Visit the Friends of Cumberland County Shelter Animals and Friends of the Harnett County Animal Shelter Facebook pages to see the status of animals no longer in our slideshow.

track.imageLink: http://fayobserver.com/photogallery/PHOTOS: Fayetteville area shelter dogs for adoption/

items.caption: SHILOH (A342234)https://petharbor.com/pet.asp?uaid=CMBR.A342234This good looking boy may be 10 years young but he has a lot of pep left in his step and plenty of life and love to give! He is very sweet, and a short little guy!! Housebroken too! He is heartworm positive but that is not contagious to other dogs and is easily treated. Can you give this little guy a home? Did you know you may be able to foster to adopt me? (Info in comments). Adoptions are by appointment only, please call to schedule to go meet him. 910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayettevile, NC

LEIA (A342260)https://petharbor.com/pet.asp?uaid=CMBR.A342260This 11 years young girl is absolutely adorable!. Leia is partially blind and deaf but that doesn't stop her from being so sweet. Beautiful Leia is very mellow and she is housebroken. Surely someone out there can give her a loving home. She has plenty of life and love to give a family! Did you know you may be able to foster to adopt me? (Info in comments). Adoptions are by appointment only, please call to schedule to go meet her. 910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayettevile, NC

ROGER (A342235)Big smiles from Roger! This handsome hunk is a really good boy!! He is hoping that a family will see his winning smile and come on in to meet him! He is heartworm negative so no worries! Did you know you may be able to foster to adopt me? (Info in comments). Adoptions are by appointment only, please call to schedule to go meet him. 910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayettevile, NC

CHICO (A342233)Sweet boy Chico looks like he hasn't had the best care. Despite that, he loves everyone and is a very mellow guy! He's hoping to finally get some good old loving and TLC from a family of his own. Can you give this good boy a chance at happiness? Did you know you may be able to foster to adopt me? (Info in comments). Adoptions are by appointment only, please call to schedule to go meet him. 910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayettevile, NC

RAMBLER A339914http://petharbor.com/pet.asp?uaid=CMBR.A339914This two year old came in after he caught his foot in a hunting trap. It has completely healed and he's ready to find his new home. He does not do well with other dogs and would need to be an only dog. Friends, just look how handsome he is, and he would love to show you just what a good boy he is. He is currently available for foster to adopt for Cumberland County residents.(info in comments) Can you give this happy fella a helping hand? 910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayetteville, NCRAMBLER A339914http://petharbor.com/pet.asp?uaid=CMBR.A339914This two year old came in after he caught his foot in a hunting trap. It has completely healed and he's ready to find his new home. He does not do well with other dogs and would need to be an only dog. Friends, just look how handsome he is, and he would love to show you just what a good boy he is. He is currently available for foster to adopt for Cumberland County residents. Can you give this happy fella a helping hand? 910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayetteville, NC Did you know that you can still foster to adopt me? During COVID-19 to limit staff contact with the public, we have temporarily stopped adoptions. BUT if you're still interested in helping Sophie and live in Cumberland County, we are still fostering animals on a limited basis. To foster please visit our county website to fill out the paperwork here http://co.cumberland.nc.us/.../animal-control/foster-careOnce completed contact Brandi at bhill@co.cumberland.nc.us

SWIZZLE (A342203) https://petharbor.com/pet.asp?uaid=CMBR.A342203 What a cutie, how can you resist this sweetness? Swizzle is the most playful little guy! He loves everyone he meets and has the cutest little underbite. He knows sit, shake, down and LOVES to play fetch! See comments for more pics, he is such a goofy boy! He has demodex and is missing some hair. This is not contagious to other dogs, cannot be cured but can be treated. Can you help him out? Did you know that you can foster to adopt me? See the Info in comments. Adoptions are by appointment please call to go meet him! 910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayetteville, NC

BRANDO (A341684)Hello handsome! This sweet boy has some skin issues that appear to have gotten better since being on antibiotics. He is such a ham and he knows "SPEAK"!! He is housebroken so no worries there. Brando is heartworm positive but that is not contagious to other dogs and is easily treated. Who can give Brando a home? He may be available for foster to adopt for Cumberland County residents. (info in comments) Adoptions are by appointment, please call to meet him! 910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayetteville, NC

AGATHA (A341850)Just look at this precious face, how can you resist such sweetness? Agatha is a very shy, quiet girl. She will sit for treats and she loves her bed and blankets! Just look at those big sad eyes, they will melt your heart! she needs some love and a family! She may be available for foster to adopt for Cumberland County residents. (info in comments) Adoptions are by appointment, please call to meet her! 910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayetteville, NC

TIMBER (A341715)https://petharbor.com/pet.asp?uaid=CMBR.A341715Oh what a handsome boy! Sweet Timber is ready to be your next furry best friend He is heartworm negative and housebroken. He is a very well mannered boy! He loves treats and he already knows sit! Who can give this good boy a home? He may also be available for foster to adopt for Cumberland County residents. (info in comments) Adoptions are by appointment, please call to meet him! 910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayetteville, NC

POPCORN (A334141)https://petharbor.com/pet.asp?uaid=CMBR.A334141Popcorn is such a good looking boy and he is sitting so pretty for his pic! He is heartworm positive but please don't let that deter you as it is not contagious to other dogs and is easily treated. Popcorn came in with Kernel but he does not appear to do well with other dogs. He sure is a sweet boy and loves to run in the yard! Who can give this sweetie a loving home? Did you know you may be able to foster to adopt me? Info in comments.910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayetteville, NC

SCARLETT A340146http://petharbor.com/pet.asp?uaid=CMBR.A340146Scarlett is a pretty girl who is a very playful pup! She loves people and seems good with other dogs.She would love to be the next puppy love of your life! Can you help her out? Did you know you can foster to adopt me? Info in comments. 910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayetteville, NC

KILO (A341634)https://petharbor.com/pet.asp?uaid=CMBR.A341634Kilo is a good looking fella who s ready to get back to some love with a family of his own! He is heartworm negative so no worries there! This playful boy, loves to be outside and would love a nice yard to hang out and enjoy spending some fun times with his family! Can you help a fella out? Did you know you may be able to foster to adopt me? Info in comments.910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayetteville, NC

ESME (A341387)https://petharbor.com/pet.asp?uaid=CMBR.A341387She's a pretty girl who is housebroken. She appears to resource guard but just may need training. Does not appear to do well others dogs. Beautiful Esme is heartworm negative and is being treated for demodex. She would love to find a family to spend her life with. Who can give her a chance? 910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayetteville, NC

MELO (A313638)https://petharbor.com/pet.asp?uaid=CMBR.A313638What a ham! Melo sure has that head tilt going on for the camera. He is such a handsome boy! He will sit for treats and he loves to play fetch! Melo is heartworm negative. He is ready to get back to some loving and fun with a family of his own! Can you help him out? Did you know you may be able to foster to adopt me? Info in comments.910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayetteville, NC

NEO (A341379)https://petharbor.com/pet.asp?uaid=CMBR.A341379Sweet Neo is a well mannered boy who would absolutely love to be the next furry love of your life. Just look at him sitting so pretty for his pic. He is heartworm negative and he will sit for treats. Is there anyone that can give this handsome and sweet boy a home? 910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayetteville, NC

KIMBA (A340016)https://petharbor.com/pet.asp?uaid=CMBR.A340016Kimba is a beauty! She has a cherry eye, but it is not causing any issues with her vision and it can be fixed. Sweet Kimba is Very playful and loves to run in the yard and play with her ball! This girl is ready to get back to some loving with a family of her own! 910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayettevile, NC

GWYNN (A340156)http://petharbor.com/pet.asp?uaid=CMBR.A340156This sweetheart is adorable, she has such a pretty face and those big eyes will melt your heart! She would love to be your new family member. She is very sweet and will sit for treats. Did you know you can foster to adopt me? Info in comments. 910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayetteville, NC Did you know that you can still foster to adopt me? During COVID-19 to limit staff contact with the public, we have temporarily stopped adoptions. BUT if you're still interested in helping Sophie and live in Cumberland County, we are still fostering animals on a limited basis. To foster please visit our county website to fill out the paperwork here http://co.cumberland.nc.us/.../animal-control/foster-careOnce completed contact Brandi at bhill@co.cumberland.nc.us

BETSY A339245 http://petharbor.com/pet.asp?uaid=CMBR.A339245 Betsy is a two year old female that is VERY energetic needs a forever home. She would need to be an only dog as she does not get along with other dogs. She will sit for treats when asked and she has a beautiful smile that will melt your heart! She is heartworm positive which will require treatment but is not contagious to other dogs. Can anyone help her? She is currently available for foster to adopt for Cumberland County residents. 910.321.6852 Cumberland County Animal Shelter Fayetteville, NC Did you know that you can still foster to adopt me? During COVID-19 to limit staff contact with the public, we have temporarily stopped adoptions. BUT if you're still interested in helping Sophie and live in Cumberland County, we are still fostering animals on a limited basis. To foster please visit our county website to fill out the paperwork here http://co.cumberland.nc.us/.../animal-control/foster-careOnce completed contact Brandi at bhill@co.cumberland.nc.us
